Articles.Content: I love ksp. I also love the community behind ksp. we give each other tips,tricks, help, support, and everything else a community needs. but I wish there was a forum app so I could view the forums on my 4G qhone without the large scale twitches that I get when trying to see words, the small text, and without the bad layout of my regular internet. I have a windows phone, but I really don't care if it is only on android/apple products.
The browser on your mobile phone should switch to the mobile skin of the forums. If not, you can select it on the bottom left of the forum index if I recall correctly.
I had no Idea. just tried it out on my computer, and I will have to do that sometimes
